package.name: LS Contacts
package.shortDescription: Favorite contacts widget on lock screen.

descriptionlist.description:
LS Contacts will add a scrollable widget (window) to your phone's lock screen.
By clicking on a contact, you can call him.
With a long hold on a contact, you can do the following: - Send WhatsApp message - Send SMS - Call on FaceTime - Send an e-mail - See the date of the birthday.
